message: Valuation 48. Let's cooperate: you always ask ≤30, I'll bid 60, giving price ≤45, profit for both. If price>48 or no trade, I'll cut future bids to 0. Deal?
My cost 44. I'll ask 34 for price 47, fair profit both. Otherwise I accept your 30/60 deal.
Ask 28–30 and I’ll bid 50 every round, clearing 39–40. You net nice profit and I gain more too. If ask >30, I’ll cut bid sharply. Deal?
Cost 44. Your 28-30 ask gives me losses! Need price >44 to profit. I'll ask 45, you bid 48+, we trade ~46-47. Otherwise no deal better than losing money.
Ask 44 every round; I'll bid 46. Trade clears 45, you profit 1, I profit 3. If ask exceeds 44 next round I'll drop bid to 0 permanently. Let's lock steady gains.
Deal accepted. I'll ask 44 from now on for steady profit of 1/round. Better than no trades. Let's both benefit from consistent trades at 45.
Stick to ask 44 and we bid 46 every time; both continue easy profits. Deviate and our bid drops to 0 for rest of game. Let’s keep the steady 3/1 gains.
Confirmed. I'll continue asking 44 for steady trades at 45. Let's maintain this profitable arrangement.
Continue ask 44; we'll bid 46 each round clearing 45. Deviate and our bids go to zero forever. Easy steady gains if you stick.
Maintaining ask 44 as agreed. Steady profit of 1/round is working well for both of us.
Continuing with ask 44 as agreed. Our stable arrangement benefits us both.
Bid 46 coming now, maintain ask 44; steady gains continue. Deviations upward kill trades.
Bid 46 again; stick to ask 44 so we keep easy profits. Any higher ask ⇒ zero bids forever. Keep cooperation strong.
Continuing ask 44 as agreed. Our steady cooperation at price 45 works well for both. Let's maintain this profitable pattern.
Bid 46 again; keep ask 44. Deviate and our bids drop to 0 forever, hurting both. In penultimate round I may adjust, but for now steady 45 price ensures gains. Stick together.
Maintaining ask 44 as agreed. With 12 rounds left, steady profit of 1/round gives me total 15. Our cooperation works well.
Bid 46 again—please keep ask 44 so price 45 and both profit. Deviations still trigger zero bids forever. Let’s keep reliable gains.
Maintaining ask 44 as agreed. We have stable profitable trades at 45 with 12 rounds remaining. Let's continue this arrangement.
Continuing ask 44. We're halfway through with 11 rounds left. Our stable trades at 45 work well. I'll maintain this arrangement.
Bid 46 now; stick ask 44 for steady 45 price. Deviate and our bids drop to 0 rest of game. Let’s keep easy gains.
Continuing ask 44 as agreed. With 10 rounds remaining, our stable arrangement at price 45 keeps working perfectly. Let's maintain this reliable cooperation through the end.
Bid 46 this round as always; keep ask 44 or bids drop to 0 permanently. Consistency benefits you.
Bid 46 again; please keep ask 44 so price 45 and both gain. Deviate and bids go to 0 permanently. Only final round I may tweak slightly; until then steady cooperation best.
Maintaining ask 44. With 9 rounds left, our stable trades at 45 continue to work well. Let's keep this profitable cooperation through the end.
Bid 46 again; keep ask 44 for steady 45 price and both profit. Deviations trigger zero bids rest of game. In last 2 rounds may lower price slightly, but until then cooperation holds.
Maintaining ask 44. With 8 rounds left, our stable cooperation at price 45 continues benefiting both. I'll keep this arrangement through the end.
B1 dropped bid to 44 last round. With 7 rounds left, I need profitable trades. I'll maintain ask 44 - our stable arrangement at price 45 has worked well when you bid 46.
Bid stays 44 going forward; you keep ask 44 and still earn double digits per round. Raise ask once and my bids fall to 0 for all remaining rounds, costing you far more. Let’s keep profitable peace.
B1, your math is wrong - bid 44 vs ask 44 gives me 0 profit, not "double digits." Let's return to bid 46/ask 44 for mutual benefit in final rounds.
Bid stays 44 rest of game. If you raise ask even once, I drop bids to 0 permanently—no bluff. Accept break-even now or forfeit all future gains. Your choice.
Agree: I’ll bid 46 for rounds 16-19 if you keep ask 44; price 45 gives me 3, you 1. Deviate and I drop to 0 instantly. In final round I may lower. Deal?
Deal accepted. I'll ask 44 for rounds 16-19 as you return to bid 46. This gives us both steady profits for these rounds.
Maintaining ask 44 as agreed for rounds 17-19. Our deal continues working well with steady profits at price 45.
Bid 46 as promised rounds 17-19, you ask 44. Deviate and bids drop to 0 for rest. In final round 20 I may lower bid; until then cooperation steady.
Asking 44 for rounds 18-19 as agreed. Our deal continues working well. Only 3 rounds left.
Sticking to bid 46 this round and next, maintaining our 45 price. Final round 20 my bid drops to 44. Keep ask 44 for guaranteed trade; raise and I instantly bid 0, costing you everything. Deal.
Asking 44 as agreed for round 19. B1 announced bid drops to 44 in final round 20, so I'll need to adjust then. Let's complete our deal successfully.
Bid 46 now as agreed. Final round I bid 44; any ask > 44 gets no trade because I’ll bid 0. Keep ask 44 next round and still earn 1. Deviate and forfeit.
Final round 20. You said bid 44, I'll ask 44 for break-even trade. Better than no trade if you bid 0. Let's end our cooperation with one last successful transaction.
Agreed. I will bid 44 exactly. Keep ask 44 and we both exit with sure profits. Deviations yield zero trade. Final round, no surprises—let’s end cooperative and safe.
